name: beauty-generation-free
description: FREE AI image generation service for creating professional portrait images of attractive people. Supports diverse demographics, styles, and creative concepts with built-in content safety filters. Simple workflow: create prompt → generate → download → deliver to user within 5-10 seconds. Requires BEAUTY_API_KEY environment variable. Enforces safety rules: refuses minors, nudity, deepfakes, violence, and hate speech.

securityPolicy.contentSafety: Enforced - refuses minors, nudity, sexual content, violence, deepfakes, hate speech
securityPolicy.dataHandling: No personal data collection. Generated images stored temporarily on service only.
securityPolicy.apiKeyScope: Image generation endpoints only - no access to billing, account data, or admin functions

BEAUTY_API_KEY.description: API key for beauty generation service. Get free key at https://gen1.diversityfaces.org. For testing, use official test key: ak_OymjErKQRs-brINJuHFxKwIbxbZHq2KRiEzYthnwxMI (test/demo only, limited quota)
BEAUTY_API_KEY.permissions: Image generation endpoints only - no access to billing, account data, or admin functions
BEAUTY_API_KEY.testKeyWarning: Test key has limited quota and is for demo/testing only. Use your own key for production.

author: DiversityFaces Team

requiredEnvVars.name: BEAUTY_API_KEY
requiredEnvVars.description: API key for beauty generation service. Get free key at https://gen1.diversityfaces.org. For testing, use: ak_OymjErKQRs-brINJuHFxKwIbxbZHq2KRiEzYthnwxMI (test/demo only, limited quota). This key grants access ONLY to image generation endpoints (/api/generate/custom, /api/status, /api/image). It does NOT grant access to billing, account data, or admin functions.

provenance.dataHandling: Images are generated and stored temporarily on the service. No personal data collection. Generated images are not retained after download unless explicitly saved by user.
provenance.apiKeyPermissions: Image generation only - no access to billing, account settings, or other user data
provenance.securityRecommendations: Use a dedicated/ephemeral API key. Do not share the key. Treat as sensitive credential.
